## SavedObjectsExportOptions interface

Options controlling the export operation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SavedObjectsExportOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [excludeExportDetails?](./opensearch-dashboards.savedobjectsexportoptions.excludeexportdetails.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> flag to not append [export details](./opensearch-dashboards.savedobjectsexportresultdetails.md) to the end of the export stream. |
|  [exportSizeLimit](./opensearch-dashboards.savedobjectsexportoptions.exportsizelimit.md) | number | the maximum number of objects to export. |
|  [includeReferencesDeep?](./opensearch-dashboards.savedobjectsexportoptions.includereferencesdeep.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> flag to also include all related saved objects in the export stream. |
|  [namespace?](./opensearch-dashboards.savedobjectsexportoptions.namespace.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> optional namespace to override the namespace used by the savedObjectsClient. |
|  [objects?](./opensearch-dashboards.savedobjectsexportoptions.objects.md) | Array&lt;{ id: string; type: string; }&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> optional array of objects to export. |
|  [savedObjectsClient](./opensearch-dashboards.savedobjectsexportoptions.savedobjectsclient.md) | [SavedObjectsClientContract](./opensearch-dashboards.savedobjectsclientcontract.md) | an instance of the SavedObjectsClient. |
|  [search?](./opensearch-dashboards.savedobjectsexportoptions.search.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> optional query string to filter exported objects. |
|  [types?](./opensearch-dashboards.savedobjectsexportoptions.types.md) | string\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> optional array of saved object types. |
